biotools.summary: iLASH - IBD Estimation Using Locality Sensitive Hashing | iLASH: Ultra-Rapid Detection of IBD Tracts | iLASH divides the genotype data in consecutive slices and then runs LSH algorithm over each slice. Slices (windows) are, thus, the building blocks of IBD tracts. The following parameters control different properties of these slices
